message.original: 大剣を突き刺し、勢いよく斬り上げる 敵を高く打ち上げることが可能 <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
message.translation: Stabs foes then fiercely slashes upward. Can send foes flying high into the air. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases number of hits.</COL>

message.original: 大剣の切っ先を前方に構え、 敵を押しこみながら突進する <PADM>左スティック<KEYM>移動キー</KEYM>で任意方向へ移動できる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で移動距離が延長／攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
message.translation: Charges forward with the blade extended, knocking down any caught in its path. Use the <PADM>left stick<KEYM>move key</KEYM> to control the direction. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases movement distance. Increases number of hits.</COL>

message.original: 前方に踏み込みながら剣の柄を打ち込む 敵を怯ませやすく、怒り状態の敵のスタミナも 減らしやすい <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６でスタミナ消費減少／攻撃範囲拡大</COL>
message.translation: Lunges in while driving the hilt of the blade into the target. Though limited in range it easily stuns foes and reduces the Stamina of enraged enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Reduces Stamina cost. Increases range of the effect.</COL>

message.original: 後方へ避けつつ攻撃を繰り出す とっさの回避手段としても有効 <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６でモーション変化／追加入力で追加攻撃 敵の攻撃を直前回避時、追加攻撃の威力上昇</COL>
message.translation: Steps backward in a swift evasive maneuver while delivering a slashing blow. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Motion changes with an additional attack. Adds an additional input.</COL>

message.original: 素早く大剣を回転させ、 自身の全周囲になぎ払い攻撃を繰り出す <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で攻撃範囲拡大</COL>
message.translation: Spins the blade in a swift circle, slashing at foes all around the user. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases the range of the effect.</COL>

message.original: 力を溜め、刀身で敵を叩きつける 敵を気絶させやすい 溜め満了の瞬間にボタンを離すと威力大幅上昇 <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で溜め段階拡張（１→２）</COL>
message.translation: Build up strength before striking enemies with the side of your blade. Has high stunning power. Release the attack as the charge finishes to increase power significantly. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases total charge stages (1→2).</COL>

message.original: 上空に対して鋭い突きを繰り出す 空中の敵などに有効 <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で攻撃範囲拡大／攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
message.translation: Thrust your blade with great force into the air. Especially effective against aerial enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases the range of the effect. Increases number of hits.</COL>

message.original: 大剣を構えて待機、敵の攻撃を弾き返した後、 連続動作で反撃する 敵の攻撃を弾き返したときのみ、連続行動を行う <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で攻撃ヒット数増加／当身の受付時間延長</COL>
message.translation: Hold the blade in wait. Upon deflecting an enemy's attack, the user will unleash a series of blows. Only a successful counter will perform multiple blows. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases number of hits. Increases counter duration.</COL>

message.original: 一歩踏み込み、敵の攻撃を受けとめる。様々な動作 から発動することができる（連続では行えない） 攻撃を受けとめるとリベンジゲージが大きく増加 <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にリベンジゲージ蓄積値上昇 LV.６でのけぞり、吹き飛び中でも発動可能</COL>
message.translation: Step inward to receive an enemy's attack. Can be used out of many different actions. Upon successfully receiving an attack, the revenge gauge will fill greatly. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases revenge gauge accumulation. LV.6: Can be used even during stagger and knockback.</COL>

message.original: 大剣を左右交互に振り下ろし、連続して敵を斬り刻む ボタンの連打で攻撃回数が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で最大攻撃回数増加（７→１１）</COL>
message.translation: Swing your blade in fierce downward motions left and right, repeatedly cutting into foes in succession. Continuously pressing the skill button increases the number of attacks. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases the maximum number of attacks (7→11).</COL>

message.original: 高く跳躍し、一点集中で力強く大剣を突き立てる 攻撃範囲は狭いが威力は絶大 <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
message.translation: Jump high upward, viciously thrusting the blade at a concentrated point with great force. The attack's range is very narrow, but it carries tremendous power. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases number of hits.</COL>
